archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Customer Order Orchestration
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: The Customer Order Orchestration function provides workflow and orchestration capabilities at the Product Order Item level for a dedicated Customer Order. Orchestration can take into account : - constraints between Product Order Items inside the Customer Order, or successive Customer Orders including modification or cancellation (in-flight changes) - any type of business rules based on information even external to the Customer Order. For example : high level of priority for VIP customers - Triggering of exception process or delivery planning update, depending on Customer Order or Service Order events.
